feed.title: Turtle Mountain (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Turtle Mountain (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:15 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melita 8:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: E 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 8:03 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:03 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow early in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 8:03 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
